name: Plush Zombie Big Critter Pillow - Bloody Valentine
description:
A New BIG Zombie Critter Pillow is here just in time for Valentines Day!

Now this is a valentine's day gift if I do say so much self, what more could a girl want but a bloody zombie plushie pillow?

There big, fluffy and they are all so soft. Curl up with one on a cold night with a nice cup of tea and a book and call it a night. Or sit on the couch with the windows open on a nice summer night and relax while listening to some music and a glass of wine. Or, enjoy the laughter and of your kids voices with these funky pillows.

This little critter is a limited edition zombie critter

20 inches tall by 20 inches wide
Hand-sewn and Machine-sewn and all fabrics are pre-washed.

Smoke Free and Pet Free environment all the Little Critter Plushies© are made in.

Custom Big Critter Pillow requests are welcomed.

name: Plush Zombie Critter Pillow - Dread
description:
Special edition Plush Zombie Critters. They ooze with fluff, blood and slime, but they are nicer then they look. Curl up with one on a cold night with a nice cup of coco and a book and call it a night.

Dread, looks horrible, but his bite is not that bad. He is actually rather sweet.

He is sure to give you a spark in your life.

Will you take this plush home with you today?

Lil Pillow Critters are 13 inches tall by 13 inches wide
Hand-sewn and Machine-sewn and all fabrics are pre-washed

name: Plush Zombie Critter - Frostbite
description:
Special edition Plush Zombie Critters. 

They ooze with fluff, blood and slime, but they are nicer then they look. Curl up with one on a cold night with a nice cup of coco and a book and call it a night. Fright Night! Frostbite is electric because you just caught him after he was electrocuted running around the grave yard on Halloween night. He is sure to give you a spark in your life.

Will you take this Zombie home with you today?

Lil Pillow Critters are 13 inches tall by 13 inches wide
Hand-sewn and Machine-sewn and all fabrics are pre-washed.
